channel.title: Two barrage questions PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
1.How would I make you get frozen for longer with barrage?I want it as 15 seconds can some1 help? 2.How do i make multi only attack people that arent wearing the cape that the barrager is using
I hope these arent too much for you
